entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
